item.title: Dollar General is a buy as consumers move to trade down, says this strategist
item.description: The strategist expects economic growth to slow in the second half of 2025, thanks to a combination of worries centered on tariffs and inflation threat...

item.title: Short-term Treasury prices are set to go higher based on the charts, says Carter Worth
item.description: The 2-year Treasury note yield is judged to be headed lower in the days and weeks ahead.

item.title: These dividend stocks will benefit from longevity's 'transformational' opportunity, UBS says
item.description: The aging population will be a tailwind for the stock market, and two dividend-paying stocks are among the beneficiaries, according to UBS.

item.title: These are analysts' favorite S&P 500 stocks as the second quarter approaches
item.description: With the current quarter winding down, there are some stocks that investors should keep an eye on heading into the next period.

item.title: Joel Greenblatt defends value investing: It's not difficult to beat the market
item.description: "We're literally valuing businesses, like we're private equity investors buying the whole business," Joel Greenblatt said.
